definition: classifier for sheets of papers etc: pile, pad/Taiwan pr. [ta4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: When the couple first dated, there were all kinds of conjectures.
sentences.chinese: 當兩人剛開始約會時，各種猜測便紛至沓來。

sentences.english: Build a better mousetrap and the world will beat a path to your door.
sentences.chinese: 放置一個更具吸引力的誘餌，世界的機遇將紛至沓來。

sentences.english: His popularity was so great that he was deluged with honors and invitations to lecture.
sentences.chinese: 盛名之下，榮譽和講演邀請書紛至沓來。

sentences.english: The star was besieged with invitations to parties.
sentences.chinese: 請明星出席聚會的邀請紛至沓來。
寄給我們的信件紛至沓來。

sentences.english: The most grotesque fantastic conceits haunted him in his bed at night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚躺在牀上的時候，各種離奇怪誕的幻想紛至沓來。

sentences.english: And come in a throng relationship tangled, taught my heart to fear.
sentences.chinese: 而紛至沓來的人際關係糾結，令我心生恐懼。

sentences.english: A few pure electric cars are already offered, and more are coming.
sentences.chinese: 一些純電力汽車也已經面世，更多的種類紛至沓來。

sentences.english: After using that for one month, there are still thousands of spams in my inbox.
sentences.chinese: 我用了一個月，發現垃圾郵件還是紛至沓來。

sentences.english: The most grotesque and fantastic conceits haunted him in his bed at night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚躺在牀上的時候，各種離奇怪誕的幻想紛至沓來。

sentences.english: So many people entered and I really wish I could reward everybody.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者紛至沓來，我真心希望能夠犒賞每一個參與者。

definition: both the guests and the hosts thoroughly enjoy themselves (idiom)
one falls, the next follows (idiom); stepping into the breach to replace fallen comrades/advancing wave upon wave
mutual exchange of assistance (idiom)/to benefit from each other's strengths and make up each other's shortfalls/to reciprocate with material assistance/scratch each other's back
to advance dauntlessly in wave upon wave (idiom)
the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
lit. to cross five passes and slay six generals (idiom)/fig. to surmount all difficulties (on the way to success)
pinyin: guo4 wu3 guan1 zhan3 liu4 jiang4

definition: to give a small demonstration of one's impressive skills (idiom)
